inventory:
set retry = duration div interval plus 1
set cmd timer
set activated
inventory
ack
----
INVENTORYING
difference:
set retry = duration div interval plus 1
set cmd timer
set activated
difference
ack
----
DIFFERENCING

inventory ack with data:
set data parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----
FETCHING INVENTORY DATA

difference ack with increment data:
set data parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----
FETCHING INCREMENT DATA
difference ack with decrement data:
set data parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----
FETCHING DECREMENT DATA

data ack, continued:
ack data
set next parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----
cmd timeout, retry > 0:
retry - 1
set cmd timer
fetch data
----

data ack, continued:
ack data
set next parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----
data ack, done with decrement data:
ack data
set decrement parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----
FETCHING DECREMENT DATA
cmd timeout, retry > 0:
retry - 1
set cmd timer
fetch data
----

data ack, continued:
ack data
set next parameter
set retry = 6
set cmd timer
fetch data
----

retry - 1
